tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-1" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Requirement</h1><p>Design Elevator low level system</p><p>System should be scalable for multiple building support</p><p>It should support more than one elevator</p><p>Flexible to apply multiple elevator algos</p><p><br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="50" width="400" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-2" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">Expectation</h1><p>Scalable design</p><p>Class diagram</p><p>Data style="text-wrap: nowrap;">ElevatorCar</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">PriorityQueue min, max</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><br></span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial; text-wrap: nowrap;">acceptRequest(floor, direction)</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial; text-wrap: nowrap;"><br></span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: initial; text-wrap: nowrap;">moveElevator(floor, direction)</span></div>" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-48" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.488;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-21" target="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-43"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-49" value="We are using priority queue to hold request. One is max heap keep highest floor request first when elevator coming downwards.<div><br></div><div>Secod is min heap keep lowest floor request first when elevator coming upwards<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="850" y="640" width="380" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-50" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.05;entryY=1.2;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;dashed=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-42" target="bvPjuK891X2ucSZeajUB-49"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="820" y="905" /> <mxPoint x="820" y="676" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 156px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: System should be scalable for multiple building support
It should support more than one elevator
Flexible to apply multiple elevator algos

div.div:
We are using priority queue to hold request. One is max heap keep highest floor request first when elevator coming downwards.
Secod is min heap keep lowest floor request first when elevator coming upwards
